Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts his adolescence through the evil schemes of the local agriculture cooperative as well as his disillusionment with society. This film also communicates a savage picture of the Japanese war efforts in China during WWII based on historical facts.
